m_szDocSumamry: PESWiki.com -- Pure Energy Systems Wiki:  Finding and Facilitating the Best Exotic Free Energy Technologies      News:140912:Recent Free Energy News Highlights From PESWiki Jump to: navigation, search Recent highlights -- mailed out alternative media. Listed in reverse chronological sequence A working hypothesis about the destruction of the WTC buildings on 9/11/2001 - The Nazi Bell project involved counter-rotating plasma containers in which the rotating plasma was subjected to electrically-generated shock waves. Materials in the vicinity ... were reported to undergo a progressive molecular d
